title: Polki Elegance: Emerald & Diamond Chandbali
features: Classic Chandbali design reimagined with a delicate floral motif. Features intricate openwork (jali) detailing. The Polki diamonds are set in a closed setting (kundan setting) that enhances their natural luster. The Emerald cabochons are carefully placed to create a vibrant contrast. The design is further complemented by small diamonds surrounding each major polki set.
colors: and White (Polki Diamond). Traditional colors associated with prosperity and auspiciousness.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi
or even to add a touch of heritage to a modern outfit.
description: Crafted with authentic Polki diamonds, each earring is a unique masterpiece. The Hyderabadi gold polish ensures long-lasting shine and beauty. This exquisite piece seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design with modern sensibilities, making it a timeless addition to your jewelry collection. Lightweight and comfortable for all-day wear. Makes for an excellent heirloom piece to pass down through generations.
